attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is not a TV Licence it's a house Tax. You cant have a valid TV Licence yourself and watch a TV next door that dose not have a Licence. Totally unfairer

rejection.details:
There is already a very similar petition online:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/NoTvLicenceFee/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
